quotelist.quote: When you were 2 years you were walking and your parent/guardian held your hand till you were able to walk, same goes with learning, you spend time and effort and you can learn your subject, no matter how many times you failed.
If someone is pointing fingers at you and talking crap about you, shows their attitude and mental state , not yours, ignore them with a cheeky smile.
The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting.
Stay positive even when your life is falling apart.
Dreams dont work unless you do.
